You saw the filibuster, now read the book. The 8 1/2- hour speech given by Sen. Bernie Sanders , I-Vt., on Dec. 10 decrying proposed tax cuts is being published by Nation Books as The Speech: A Historic Filibuster on Corporate Greed and the Decline of Our Middle Class, Bernie Sanders announced Wednesday.
